CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mixes bass hit and bass level

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Takes pow of bass hit and bass level, increments makes more distinct

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass limit detector, min and max edge
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_limit

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Distance and modulator of the kali fractal
CONTROLS.NAME: shape_xy

CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash intensity, min max

CONTROLS.NAME: base_zw

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Controls kali fractal color saturation and offset
CONTROLS.NAME: base_mod

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How much of the past bleeds into the present frame, different values for non-beat and beat

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How the past scales into the present frame, different values for non-beat and beat
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How the past rotates into the present frame, different values for non-beat and beat
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback beat color modified
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_max
